Hi,
I am using junit (version 3.7, and apache's xerces xml parser) to do 
unit test for my class which is a xml parser with dom. I can run the 
program through the main method with the class, but it fail if I run 
from junit test. the message is:

Could not start test case: java.lang.ClassCastException: 
org.apache.xerces.parsers.StandardParserConfiguration

at the line:
	DOMParser parser = new DOMParser();


Please help.
